info.title: Sites
info.description:
The Sites API provides endpoints for site and building management, including:
* Creating & managing sites & associated buildings
* Creating & managing addresses
* Viewing current and forecasted weather conditions
* Viewing timezone details for an IANA Timezone ID

## Site Types
Sites are of one of two types: 

* A `building` is a site composed of a single building and can be assigned an address and contacts.

* A `campus` is a high-level collection of buildings. A campus cannot be assigned an addressis or contacts.

## Quotas and Licensing
Site management is a paid feature. Physical sites are subject to quota availability. Virtual sites and buildings are not measured against a pre-defined quota but require a seperate license. These requirments are outlined in the various endpoint docs.

If insufficient quota or licensing exists for the specified site type, a `403 Forbidden` error will be thrown and the site will not be created.

get.description:
Retrieve a list of sites

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:site:*`,`sites:site:list`

### Filtering Results
A combination of one or more query parameters may be used to filter returned data. Query parameters are stacked such that using multiple parameters will result in a narrower data set.

Wildcard searches are permitted on all query parameters. Wildcard searches are case insensitive and all data is forced to lowercase for matching purposes. See usage examples below.

<!--
title: "Site Code Wildcard Search"
lineNumbers: false
-->
```text
https://api.counterbalance.io/v1/site?code=*MN*
```
<!--
title: "Site Name Wildcard Search"
lineNumbers: false
-->
```text
https://api.counterbalance.io/v1/site?name=*elementary*
```

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Filter results by site code. Accepts * wildcard searches.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter results by site name. Accepts * wildcard searches.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Filter sites by description. Accepts * wildcard searches.

post.description:
Create a new site

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:site:*`,`sites:site:create`

> **Heads Up** This endpoint is subject to `site` quota availabilty

name.description: The name of the new site

code.description: A unique code to identify the site

delete.description:
Delete a site

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:site:*`,`sites:site:delete`

<!--theme: info -->
> **Heads Up** Specified site must be void of any associated objects (floors, rooms, equipment, etc) otherwise the delete operation will fail

<!-- theme: danger -->
> **Danger** This cannot be undone!

get.description:
### Synopsis
Retrieve the details for the specified address

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:
* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:address:*`,`sites:address:read`

patch.description:
### Synopsis
Update the details for the specified address

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:
* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:address:*`,`sites:address:update`

delete.description:
### Synopsis
Delete the specified address

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:
* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:address:*`,`sites:address:delete`

parameters.name: addressId
parameters.description: A valid address UUID

post.description:
Perform operations on an address

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:site:*`,`sites:address:*`,`sites:address:update`

### Supported Operations
The following operations are currently supported:

#### Address Normalization
An existing address object can be normalized or re-normalized by specifying the operation as `normalize`. The address' existing lines, city, and state values are used to generate a normalization query and updates are performed based on these values. If normalization data is incorrect, try adjusting these parameters and re-normalizing. 

When an address is normalized, the following properties are looked up and overridden: `city`,`state`,`latitude`,`longitude`,`postcode`,`locality`,`county`,`country`,`timezone`

put.summary: Add Address to Site or Building
put.description:
Create a new address object and attach it to a site

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:site:*`,`sites:site:update`

### Address Geocoding
By default, new addresses are geocoded to determine their GPS coordinates, timezone, and to fill-in various extended properties such as the locality, country, and ZIP or postcode. 

Geocoding is an optional process and can be skipped by setting `geocode` to `false` in the request body. If geocoding is skipped, the following additional body parameters become required: `county`, `country`, `postcode`, `timezone`

street.description: An array of address lines, up to two

country.description: The ISO 3166 alpha-3 country code (USA, CAN, etc)

timezone.description: An IANA timezone code for the address

latitude.description: The longitude value of the address

longitude.description: The latitude value of the address

parameters.name: @site
parameters.description: A valid site UUID for which to assign this address

phrases.long: Areas of low clouds, then some sun
Areas of low clouds, then some sun

error.console: Specify either coordinates or an address ID, but not both
Specify either coordinates or an address ID
Invalid duration value. Allowed value(s): 1, 5, 10, or 15
The address ID 8ac7d5dc-803d-40ac-bc37-16c0dbffe5d8 is not geocoded and we have no coordinates to check

get.description:
Retrieve a detailed daily weather forecast

 **Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:weather:*`,`sites:weather:forecast`

 ### Specifying the Location
Weather forecasts can be obtained for a specified set of coordinates or by specifying a geocoded address object ID. Either the `coordinates` or `@address` query parameters must be passed, but not both.

If the specified address ID has not been geocoded, an error will be returned.

<!-- theme: warning-->
> Parameters `coordinates` and `@address` are mutually exclusive. Passing more than one will result in an error 

### Units
By default, data is returned in Imperial units. To return data in Metric units, pass the `metric` query parameter and set it to _true_. 

### Language
By default, data is returned in English. To return data in another language, pass the `langugage` query parameter and set it to a valid IETF language code

parameters.name: coordinates
parameters.description: Get the weather forecast for the specified lat/lon position

parameters.name: @address
parameters.description: Get the weather forecast for the specified address ID

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The number of forecast outlook days to return

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Return the results with metric units instead of imperial units

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language in which search results should be returned. Should be one of supported IETF language tags, case insensitive.

error.console: Specify either coordinates or an address ID
The address ID 8ac7d5dc-803d-40ac-bc37-16c0dbffe5d8 could not be found in the database
Parameters coordinates and address are mutually exclusive. Specify only one.
The address ID 8ac7d5dc-803d-40ac-bc37-16c0dbffe5d8 is not geocoded and we have no coordinates to check

get.description:
Retrieve detailed current weather conditions

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:weather:*`,`sites:weather:currently`

### Specifying the Location
Weather conditions can be obtained for a specified set of coordinates or by specifying a geocoded address object ID. Either the `coordinates` or `@address` query parameters must be passed, but not both.

If the specified address ID has not been geocoded, an error will be returned.

<!-- theme: warning-->
> _Parameters `coordinates` and `@address` are mutually exclusive. Passing more than one will resultin an error_

### Units
By default, data is returned in Imperial units. To return data in Metric units, pass the `metric` query parameter and set it to _true_. 

### Language
By default, data is returned in English. To return data in another language, pass the `langugage` query parameter and set it to a valid IETF language code

parameters.name: coordinates
parameters.description: Get the current conditions for the specified lat/lon position

parameters.name: @address
parameters.description: Get the current conditions for the specified address ID

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Return the results with metric units instead of imperial units

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language in which search results should be returned. Should be one of supported IETF language tags, case insensitive.

areas.name: North Coast
areas.summary: High Surf Advisory in effect from 10:00 PM PST until Wednesday, 10:00 PM PST.  Source: U.S. National Weather Service
areas.details:
...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM
PST WEDNESDAY...

* WHAT...Large breaking waves of 18 to 21 feet expected in the
  surf zone.

* WHERE...North Coast and Central Coast.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Dangerous conditions along the coast and in the surf
  zone. Localized beach erosion may also occur due to large waves.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

Large waves may break and run up beaches farther than usual. Keep
your distance from the coastline and never turn your back on the
ocean.

Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to
dangerous surf conditions.

&&

error.console: Specify either coordinates or an address ID
The address ID 8ac7d5dc-803d-40ac-bc37-16c0dbffe5d8 could not be found in the database
Parameters coordinates and address are mutually exclusive. Specify only one.
The address ID 8ac7d5dc-803d-40ac-bc37-16c0dbffe5d8 is not geocoded and we have no coordinates to check

get.description:
Retrieve current sever weather alerts and advisories

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:

* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:weather:*`,`sites:weather:alerts`
* Licensed Feature: `weather_alerts`

### Specifying the Location
Weather alerts and advisories can be obtained for a specified set of coordinates or by specifying a geocoded address object ID. Either the `coordinates` or `address` query parameters must be passed, but not both.

If the specified address ID has not been geocoded, an error will be returned.

<!-- theme: warning-->
> _Parameters `coordinates` and `address` are mutually exclusive. Passing more than one will result in an error_

### Language
By default, data is returned in English. To return data in another language, pass the `langugage` query parameter and set it to a valid IETF language code.

<!-- theme: warning-->
> _The API supports any valid IETF language code but alert data may not be available in the specified language_

parameters.name: coordinates
parameters.description: Get weather alerts for the specified lat/lon position

parameters.name: @address
parameters.description: Get weather alerts for the specified address ID

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language in which search results should be returned. Should be one of supported IETF language tags, case insensitive.

get.description:
Geocode a search query

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`view:console*`

### Accepted Queries
*coming soon*

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A geocode search query

error.console: Specify either an IANA timezone ID, coordinates, or an address ID
Parameters timezone, coordinates, and address are mutually exclusive. Specify only one.
The address ID ... is not geocoded and we have no coordinates to check

get.description:
### Synopsis
Retrieve timezone details including the current time

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:

* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:utilities:*`,`sites:utilities:timezone`
* Licensed Feature: `sites_base`

### Specifying Coordinates or Address ID
Timezone details can be obtained for a specified set of coordinates or by specifying a geocoded address object ID. Either the `coordinates` or `@address` query parameters must be passed, but not both.

If the specified address ID has not been geocoded, an error will be returned.

### Specifying am IANA Timezone ID
Timezone details can be obtained for any Timezone by specifying the IANA timezone ID

<!-- theme: warning-->
> _Parameters `timezone`, `coordinates` and `@address` are mutually exclusive. Passing more than one will result in an error_

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: An IANA timezone ID

parameters.name: coordinates
parameters.description: Get the timezone for the specified coordinates

parameters.name: @address
parameters.description: Get the timezone for the specified address ID

get.description:
Retrieve a list of floors

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:floor:*`,`sites:floor:list`

post.description:
Create a new floor and assign it to a site

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:floor:*`,`sites:floor:create`

code.description: A unique code for the floor

below_grade.description: Indicate if the floor is below grade. Default is `false`

@site.description: A valid site UUID that will contain this floor

delete.description:
Delete a floor

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:floor:*`,`sites:floor:delete`

<!-- theme: danger -->
> **Danger** This cannot be undone!

get.description:
Retrieve a list of rooms

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:room:*`,`sites:room:list`

post.description:
Create a new room and assign it to a floor

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:room:*`,`sites:room:create`

### Defining Room Occupancy
The room occupancy classification must be specifid in the `occupancy` body parameter. One of the [International Building Code (IBC)](https://buildingcodetrainer.com/building-occupancy-classification-occupancy-types-explained/) occupancy codes is required and all occupancies are considered valid values.

### Defining Room Area
The `area` body parameter is required and should contain the net area of the room in localized units (square meters or square feet). Only integer values are permitted.

area.description: The net area of the room in localized units (integers only)

@floor.description: A valid floor UUID that will contain this room

occupancy.description: The IBC occupancy classification of this room

patch.description:
Update a room

### Prerequisites
The following prerequisites are required for this endpoint:
* An active tenant account
* Permissions _(at least one):_ `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:room:*`,`sites:room:update`

area.description: The net area of the room

@floor.description: The floor the room belongs to

delete.description:
Delete a room

**Required Permissions:** `*`,`sites:*`,`sites:room:*`,`sites:room:delete`

<!-- theme: danger -->
> _**Heads Up** This cannot be undone!_
